scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules bower_components
scripts.build: npm run clean && pulp build --main Kubernetes.Client --build-path output --to output/app.js
scripts.build:watch: npm run clean && pulp --watch build --main Kubernetes.Client --build-path output --to output/app.js
scripts.build:generation: npm run clean && pulp build --src-path src/Kubernetes/Generation --main Kubernetes.Generation.Main --build-path output --to output/generate.js
scripts.build:generation:watch: npm run clean && pulp --watch build --src-path src/Kubernetes/Generation --main Kubernetes.Generation.Main --build-path output --to output/generate.js
scripts.generate:watch: npm run clean && pulp --watch --then 'npm run generate' build --src-path src/Kubernetes/Generation --main Kubernetes.Generation.Main --build-path output --to output/generate.js
scripts.test:integration:local: ./scripts/start_minikube.sh && CA_CERT=~/.minikube/ca.crt CLIENT_CERT=~/.minikube/client.crt CLIENT_KEY=~/.minikube/client.key K8S_HOST=localhost K8S_PORT=8443 K8S_PROTOCOL=https npm run test:integration
